metadata.name: The Jaguar
metadata.description:
18" x 24" | Canson Mixed-media Paper | Ballpoint Art | by Award winning Equine, Western & Wildlife Ballpoint Artist Robin D. Cox

Being the largest cat species in the world, the jaguar is only native to the Americas.

The Jaguar was completed over 6 months with over 65 hours of work. Beautifully done in ballpoint pen, The Jaguar shows the spotting pattern that helps her blend effortlessly in to the surrounding foliage.

This NFT is accompanied by the physical piece of art to the 1st purchaser and come with a certificate of authenticity.

Artist retains all copyright, print rights and image rights.
